modal.instructionsStep1: Cannot Sign In? Follow these steps:
modal.instructionsStep2: 1. Enter your badge number in the "Badge Number" field.
modal.instructionsStep3: 2. Enter your pin code in the "Pin Code" field.
modal.instructionsStep4:
3. Click on the "Sign In" button.
If you still have trouble signing in, please call our office for assistance.

summonDetails.summonedForJuryService: YOU HAVE BEEN SUMMONED FOR JURY SERVICE
summonDetails.name: Name
summonDetails.courtSchedule: Court is held every Monday at 8:00 AM PDT, excluding holidays.
summonDetails.postponeInstructions: You may edit your summons by postponing to a later date and/or changing locations.
summonDetails.cannotPostpone: You are no longer able to postpone this summon.
